title: Chiricahua National Monument: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit         Hiker on the Echo Canyon Trail NPS Photo  Chiricahua National Monument is truly one of the National Park Service secret treasures. If you are willing to drive the 37 miles off I-10, you will be surprised to discover a mountain wonderland of trees, wild animals, and the amazing balanced rock and pinnacles that make this place so unique.      Planning For...      How To Get Here  Chiricahua, while off the beaten path, is worth the journey.      Things To Do Find out where to hike, drive, picnic, camp, or watch wildlife.       Guided Tours Join a park ranger or park volunteer to learn more about the park      Current Conditions Check the current weather conditions to plan what to bring
